NK040(thi)012:2: ma cig jo mo lab sgron ma //
NK040(thi)012:3: ma drag po'i las la bskul pa ni //
NK040(thi)012:4: rje btsun rdo rje rnal 'byor ma //
NK040(thi)012:5: sku mdog dmar mo li khri'i mdog /
NK040(thi)012:6: zhal gcig phyag gnyis spyan gsum mche ba gtsigs //
NK040(thi)012:7: spyan gsum sdang mig bar snang khams su bgrad //
NK040(thi)012:8: zhabs gnyis brkyang bskum gar thabs sna tshogs mdzad //
NK040(thi)012:9: dbu skra dmar ser lha yi gnas su 'bar //
NK040(thi)012:10: rin po che dang thod skam lnga yi brgyan //
NK040(thi)012:11: zhal nas phata sgra 'brug sgra ti ri ri //
NK040(thi)012:12: khro gnyer smin ma glog ltar khyugs se khyug /
NK040(thi)012:13: sku la khrag gis char pa si li li //
NK040(thi)012:14: snyan nas rdo rje'i tho ba sha ra ra //
NK040(thi)012:15: shang nas ye shes rlung dmar tshubs se tshub //
NK040(thi)012:16: ljags la ye shes me 'bar ta la la //
NK040(thi)012:17: phyag g.yas mi lpags g.yang gzhi lhabs se lhab //
NK040(thi)012:18: lan gsum brdab pas srid gsum zil gyis gnon //
NK040(thi)012:19: phyag g.yon pas mi rkang gling bu 'bud //
NK040(thi)012:20: thang gsum 'bud pas khams gsum dbang du bsdus //
NK040(thi)012:21: ma sku stod zhing chen a g+ha ra //
NK040(thi)012:22: rak+ta khrag gis thig pa sha ra ra //
NK040(thi)012:23: sku smad stag gis sham thabs can //
NK040(thi)012:24: gnam lcags thog gis char pa si li li //
NK040(thi)012:25: thod phreng sbrul chun do shal sa la bshal //
NK040(thi)012:26: zhabs gnyis rdo rje dmyal ba gnon //
NK040(thi)012:27: ma gar thab kyis glog dmar brengs se breng //
NK040(thi)012:28: rus pa'i rgyan cha khra la la //
NK040(thi)012:29: b+han+d+ha'i phreng ba khri li li //
NK040(thi)012:30: thal chen thal ba thu lu lu //
NK040(thi)012:31: zhag gis zo ris shigs se shig /
NK040(thi)012:32: rdo rje gri gug so tshig sha ra ra //
NK040(thi)012:33: mi nag lag sbrel gyis gur khang shags se shag /
NK040(thi)012:34: drag po dmigs thun shigs se shig /
NK040(thi)012:35: phata kyi 'brug sgra ti ri ri //
NK040(thi)012:36: steng na lha tshogs thibs se theb //
NK040(thi)012:37: bar na mkha' 'gro dpungs se dpung //
NK040(thi)012:38: 'og na chos skyong khrigs se khrig /
NK040(thi)012:39: khyod rang 'dra ba mang pos bskor //
NK040(thi)012:40: ma khams gsum dbang du bsdus cing byon //
NK040(thi)012:41: srid gsum zil gyis gnon cing byon //
NK040(thi)012:42: stong gsum phata sgra'i kheng zhing byon //
NK040(thi)012:44: gdon mgo bskor byed pa'i lha 'dre pho mo rnams //
NK040(thi)012:45: zhabs lcags khang nag po nang du chug /
NK040(thi)012:46: mi lpags g.yang gzhi'i kha khob la //
NK040(thi)012:47: mi mgo phreng ba'i mtha' nas non //
NK040(thi)012:48: steng nas khro bo khro mo'i zil gyis gnon par mdzod //
